Reviews.Title: Problem finding channels that worked
Reviews.Author: Dan Miller
Reviews.Content: Well, I received the unit. the odd thing was that they sent a 16-channel instead of the 8-channel. Sounds great, right. When I started hooking up the cameras, you would think 6 cameras just use 1-6. Well, that didn't work. I did find enough channels that worked to get the job done and everything is working fine. I still wonder if they had send the 8-channel would that would have been a better unit. Bottom line, it works. It was delivered fast.

Reviews.Title: Major unpatched security vulnerability in this device -- do not buy until Samsung resolves.
Reviews.Author: R H
Reviews.Content: Major security vulnerability that has gone unpatched after 3 months of initial reporting.  Samsung has yet to release a firmware to patch this security hole.  I would complain loudly to them if you own a device.  I would strongly not recommend this device until these issues are addressed.http://hustoknow.blogspot.com/2013/11/samsung-dvr-security-vulnerability.html
